#Text=30 dead in Baghdad bomb blasts , hundreds of people injured
#Text=Sunday , April 4 , 2010
#Text=Three car bombs were detonated in Baghdad , the capital of Iraq on Sunday morning , killing 30 people .
#Text=The attacks were aimed at foreign embassies , according to sources .
#Text=224 people were wounded in the bombings which occurred in quick succession according to officials .
#Text=The explosion [ at the Iranian embassy ] was really strong .
#Text=They never kill ministers , officials or heads of state .
#Text=They kill taxi drivers , public employees and shopkeepers .
#Text=How much longer will this last ?
#Text=— Abu Ahmed , witness to the attack

#Text=" They were suicide attacks against the Egyptian and Iranian embassies , " commented Major General Qassim Atta , who is the spokesperson for the Baghdad operations of the Iraqi security agencies .
#Text=According to him , one of the attacks were at a junction close to the German and Syrian embassies .
#Text=The German foreign ministry officials claimed that an security guard of Iraq was killed while three others were injured .
#Text=The head of the Egyptian embassy 's security was killed and several guards were wounded in the blast .
#Text=Atta stated that Iraqi security agencies had barred a car with a bomb in Masbah , central Baghdad .
#Text=The car was allegedly to be used to attack the headquarters of security police , whose work was to protect embassy officials .
#Text=The bomb was defused and the driver of the car arrested by security forces .

#Text=The explosions which occurred almost simultaneously broke windows in adjoining buildings , sparked exchange of gunfire between the security personnel and the attacker , thereby sending smoke clouds in the sky .
#Text=Two suicide car bombs were detonated in the neighbourhood of Mansur in west Baghdad while a third explosion occurred close to the Iranian embassy in the city .
#Text=No group has yet claimed responsibility for the attacks .
#Text=Said Mohammed , a witness of the blast near the Egyptian embassy , said guards had made an attempt to stop the bomber . "

#Text=Three security guards shouted at the truck to stop moving , and opened fire on the driver ,  said he .

#Text=He angrily shouted at Iraqi army officers on seeing this , saying :  How did the truck get here ? "

column1: #Text=Pieces of shrapnel covered the street in front of the embassy building .
#Text=The entrance to the building was destroyed ; a crater five metres ( 16feet ) in diameter could be seen near it .
#Text=" The explosion [ at the Iranian embassy ] was really strong , " said Abu Ahmed , a taxi driver who was an eyewitness of one of the blasts .
#Text=" They never kill ministers , officials or heads of state .
